title: L33ch Module
desc:
Post 839
- Can only be played with <:weapon:1107519313075785768> cards.
- When played, the <:weapon:1107519313075785768> gains a Leech on top of it, making them draw a card every one of their turns until they play a <:lime:1108048230542999633>, <:red:1106234051129507932>, or <:black:1106265022453268530> card.
- if the card is one of the 5 that dont target a player because Hyper forgot <:weapon:1107519313075785768>s are supposed to harm other players, this cant be used on that weapon.
